experience.description: Working in the Ads Ranking Team- Handling high throughput, low latency systems serving 50K QPS.- Microservice migration from Java to GoLang for better performance, scalability and ease of use.- Serving as primary on-call to mitigate potential issues and maintain the high throughput systems.- Collaboration with Product, Business, Data Science, and Tech Teams.
